page.title: 08EDUCATION
page.content: EDUCATION Education in this area is adequate. Badsworth has one First School where all the children in Thorpe Audlin and Badsworth go.There is one Middle School where all the children in Ackworth,Badsworth and Thorpe Audlin go.The Middle School has eighteen teachers including the Head Teacher.Fourteen of the teachers have classes of their own but also teach other classes.One teacher specialises in music and takes all the classes in the school.Another teacher takes the first and second years for Geometry. Another teacher takes years three and four for science and has the top maths set in year four.The school has four year groups.Each is split into four maths sets.Set one being the highest and set four the lowest. Paul Griffin aged 13
